title: Sources: Carroll agrees to deal to coach Raiders
description: Pete Carroll and the Raiders have reached an agreement on a three-year deal with a fourth-year team option to be the team's new head coach, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
author: Paul Gutierrez

title: Sources: Texans fire OC Slowik after 2 seasons
description: The Texans fired several offensive coaches Friday, including Bobby Slowik, who is out after two seasons as offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN.
author: DJ Bien-Aime

title: 'A fresh start for one of the worst signings in Man Utd history'
description: Manchester United winger Antony arrived in the summer of 2022 full of promise but he is now on the brink of leaving the club as one of their worst ever signings.

title: Sabalenka aims to 'join legends' in Keys showdown
description: Aryna Sabalenka aims to become the first woman in 26 years to win three successive Australian Open titles when she meets Madison Keys in Saturday's final.

title: Amorim addresses Garnacho future amid Chelsea interest
description: Ruben Amorim addressed Alejandro Garnacho's future with the Manchester United winger subject of continued interest from Chelsea in the January transfer window.

title: Pep faces up to reality: We got what we deserved - we could not cope
description: Pep Guardiola admitted Manchester City being eliminated from the Champions League is now a "reality" following the 4-2 defeat to Paris-Saint Germain away from home.

title: Should the Spurs spice things up with Curry? There's a big reason to do it
description: San Antonio has a shot to pay up for an all-time great, thanks to Victor Wembanyama and a CBA quirk. Remember Miami's Shaq-Wade maneuver?
author: Yahoo Sports

title: 'He's a winner:' How Al Horford found his homeÂ and NBA glory
description: The Celtics' veteran leader took a long, winding road to his first NBA title, and he's reaping the rewards of his patience.
author: Yahoo Sports
